name: Social Tracker
author: Bhagirath

sections.description:
We store your daily social and SEO Ranks, so you can report your website’s daily growth.

In this was you come to know day by day social share,like and rank.

Here is an example how it will store your data
http://www.click2check.net/click2check?url=wordpress.org
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes. this plugin is totally free.

Is this plugin store data in database?

No, We store data on our server.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • New Desing and user interface.

1.1

  • More light version and load faster

1.0

  • Track Social and SEO Ranks.
